short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Job Application Tracker for Software Engineers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job Tracker Plus is the essential tool for software engineers managing job applications with ease. Track your job search process, monitor statuses, and gain insights without ever leaving your browser.

Manage Your Job Search Like a Pro:

Track job applications: Effortlessly log, update, and follow up on your job applications.
Monitor statuses: Stay on top of each application and know exactly where you stand.
Career Pages Access: Quickly navigate to company career pages to explore new job opportunities.
Analyze your progress: Get detailed insights with charts to keep your job search on track.

⭐ FEATURES ⭐ 
🟢 Log and track your job applications
📊 View application progress and status
🔗 Direct links to career pages for easy job browsing
💻 Keep everything stored locally on your device for added privacy
📈 Visualize your progress with analytics and charts
💼 Browse job postings on company career pages directly from the app
